item.title: Contact
item.description: Get in touch If you'd like to register as a beta tester - send us a message with a link to your professional profile and we'll get back to you as soon as we can! Email contact@mlaudio.io Looking for careers? View all job openings. Full name Email Phone Message Submit

item.title: mlaudio
item.description: About Us Machine Learning Audio develops autonomous software agents that supercharge productivity for audio and music professionals. Craig Edney Founder / CEO Craig has over 10 years experience as a DJ, musician and audio engineer and is a professional developer (cloud, software, web) with experience in fintech and healthcare. He has studied at the University of Southampton WSI and worked with high profile academics such as Dame Professor Wendy Hall.

item.title: Product
item.description: Future-focused Technical research Perception Interpretation and reasoning of sensory audio data, transforming into usable insights for audio and music professionals. Classification Algorithmic management of your audio files, so you never have to organise folder structures or write metadata again. Prediction Optimisations are made to your workflow, based on your interaction - helping to speed up your project completion time.
